constructor.details: Constructor to set `maxSecondsBeforePriceIsStale` as well as all Chainlink price feeds.

getUnderlyingPrice(address).details: Implements the `PriceOracle` interface for Ionic pools (and Compound v2).

returns._0: Price in ETH of the token underlying `cToken`, scaled by `10 ** (36 - underlyingDecimals)`.

hasPriceFeed(address).details: Returns a boolean indicating if a price feed exists for the underlying asset.

price(address).details: Returns the price in ETH of `underlying` (implements `BasePriceOracle`).

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Returns the price in ETH of the token underlying `cToken`.

maxSecondsBeforePriceIsStale().notice: The maximum number of seconds elapsed since the round was last updated before the price is considered stale. If set to 0, no limit is enforced.
